channel.title: WSTG-v42-ERRH-02 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-v42-ERRH-02 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Application Error Disclosure
item.description: This page contains an error/warning message that may disclose sensitive information like the location of the file that produced the unhandled exception. This information can be used to launch further attacks against the web application. The alert could be a false positive if the error message is found inside a documentation page.
